message: So how do you use it. U press it and what happens. I'm not dumb I just don't Undrrstand

i'm assuming you're serious. you press it, a chat-like message box appear, you type, hit send, the other end received a text message. now if memory serves, unless you have a skype-in number, your friend/contact can't just reply directly to that random number.
Ok thanks. So not good at this stuff thats why I need help.
